subject: Re: [junit] How to write a Build file which looks at build  xml in sub directories
msgSnippet: So said  devendra.singh@lntinfotech.com  on  2002-12-18 ... builds the ... My guess is that you ll get better advice on an Ant mailing list than on a JUnit
messageBody:
So said devendra.singh@... on 2002-12-18
--------------------

>Hi,
>
>I need help to write a Build file which goes to subfolder first,
builds the
>subfolder and then come at root to do the final build.

My guess is that you'll get better advice on an Ant mailing list than
on a JUnit mailing list.

Good luck.

J. B. Rainsberger,
